archimate:BusinessActor.name: Customer
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation: The customer is more and more expert in H/C. When he purchases a machine costing 10M$, he wants to be sure to be able to perform his missions in the mission conditions. The customer used to spend 25% of the buying process time alone and 75% with the vendor. Now, he spends 75% of the time alone and only 25% with the vendor. Organized in missions
